Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: This has moved to a later point in time, after the new model upgrade is completed.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: If marking this as v1.1 was incorrect, feel free to change to v1.0.0. However, begs the question why this is in the current sprint.

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: Hi ~ChristopherFerris , indeed this was an item for v1.0. Upgrade review & security work is done in parallel with the security work in LCCC install and instantiate as they have many things in common. This is the reason this is in the current sprint.
